name: TXP_LAS_EXCEPTION_AUD
description: This table extracts the related multiple-response Lung Allocation Score (LAS) Exceptions Audit Info (I HSB 30434) item.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the episode record.

columns.name: GROUP_LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of one of the multiple values associated with a specific group of data within this record.

columns.name: LAS_EXCEP_AUDIT_C_NAME
columns.description: Stores the audit trail information for the lung allocation score exceptions for the transplant episode.
